data.name: ACH Processing Automation - Choice Bank
data.description: Comprehensive automation of ACH incoming and outgoing processes with OFAC compliance monitoring, file handling, and exception management for a leading consumer banking institution.
data.clientDescription: Consumer banking institution specializing in digital financial services

challenge.summary: Manual ACH processing with complex OFAC compliance requirements and exception handling
details: Manual processing of ACH files in four different time slots
Complex OFAC suspect monitoring and clearance procedures
Manual file upload to Horizon portal with 10-minute monitoring cycles
Manual exception handling for compliance violations
Time-intensive pre-deposit processes with multiple validation steps
Risk of human error in regulatory compliance procedures

solution.summary: Automated ACH processing system with integrated OFAC monitoring and exception management
approach: Automated file pickup and processing across four time slots
Integration with Horizon portal for seamless file uploads
Automated OFAC monitoring with 10-minute check cycles
Intelligent exception handling and workflow routing
Automated customer status validation and updates
Integration with Verafin folder for compliance processing

results.summary: Achieved complete automation of ACH processing with enhanced compliance monitoring

metrics.description: Complete automation of ACH file processing
Significant reduction in manual processing errors

benefits: Automated file processing eliminates manual intervention
Enhanced regulatory compliance through systematic OFAC monitoring
Reduced operational risk through consistent processing
Improved accuracy in customer status validation
Enhanced audit trails for regulatory reporting

phases: ACH process analysis and workflow mapping
Integration design for Horizon portal and Verafin
Bot development for file processing and validation
OFAC monitoring and exception handling implementation
Testing across all ACH scenarios and edge cases
implementation.methodology: Phased implementation with parallel testing and validation
